name: Repair Wuhan
description: In 2020, China and Wuhan in particular experienced a terrible beginning. Due to the new coronavirus pneumonia incident, Wuhan closed the city in January, and countless medical personnel participated in the battle. However, if you know a little in advance, decide a little in advance, and don't make so many mistakes in advance, it will be better. Players can try to modify some previous judgments through some simple interactions.
